name: @ogdrip/backend
description: Go backend for Open Graph image generation (no Node dependencies required)

scripts.dev: go run main.go server.go service.go database.go sentry.go -service
scripts.dev:backend: go run main.go server.go service.go database.go sentry.go -service
scripts.start: go run main.go server.go service.go database.go sentry.go -service
scripts.test:coverage: go test -v -coverprofile=coverage.out ./... && go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html
